nio/Replicator.description: The Replicator block multiplies each incoming signal into a list of signals and emits that list. The length of the multiplied signals will be the same as the length of the list configured in the *list* property.  Each signal emitted will be the same as the original incoming signal, with an added attribute (Attribute Title) whose value corresponds to the *list* value at the same index.

list.title: List
list.description: An expression property that needs to evaluate to a list. A signal will be notified from the block for each item in the list.

title.title: Attribute Title
title.description: Name of attribute to be added with the corresponding list value.
